name: Collide-o-Tops! :: Ludum Dare 32
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 32, Unconventional Weapon. In this game, you eliminate your foes by knocking them off the arena with your superiority - in a spinning top form!

Ludum Dare Page

I made this game in game maker studio, so you'll have to use that to open the "source" (the game's project file).

The game saves your score data to C:\Users\your_user_name\AppData\Local\UnconventionalWeapon
